message: Let's start fair. I'll take a larger share, but I'm open to negotiation in the following rounds.
You took a big share in the first round, now it's my turn to take a bigger share.
Let's split it evenly this time. We can both get a good share, and avoid further inflation.
You wanted to split it evenly last round, but now you're offering me less than before. I'm not falling for it.
This is my final offer.  I'm willing to give up a bit more to avoid further losses from inflation. Let's end this game.
You said it was your final offer, but I'm not convinced. I'll take the last crumbs.
We're running out of time.  I'm willing to compromise again to avoid losing everything.
You keep compromising, but I'm not budging. Take it or leave it.
I'm willing to take a smaller share now. Let's end this before we both lose everything.
You're getting desperate, and I'm getting greedy. Take the last crumbs, Alice.
I'm running out of options.  I'll take what I can get to avoid losing everything.  This is my final offer.
I guess I was too greedy. Better late than never, I suppose.
